alert.note: Alert for Fresno-Tulare Foothills; Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 4:18PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN TULARE AND EAST CENTRAL FRESNO COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM PDT... At 417 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm just south of Lake Wishon, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. Lozalized heavy rainfall might result in nuisance flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Lozalized heavy rainfall might result in nuisance flooding. Locations impacted include... Lake Wishon, Grant Grove, Crystal Springs Campground, Pinehurst, Azalea Campground, Sunset Campground, Hume Lake, and Grant Grove Visitor Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Fresno-Tulare Foothills; Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge
